Detailed Description

Author:
Jack Owen Shelton CS4322 Project Predator VS. Prey Simulator.
Date:
Spring 2009Prey behavior for Prey that run at the first sight of a Predator, kind of mimicks the standard GenericPreyBehavior, but simpler.

Update the associated Owner using the Behavior.

Parameters:
owner The Predator using the Behavior.
movedPrey The list containing all prey animals that moved in the last update cycle.
stateChangedPrey The list containing all prey animals whose state changed during the last update cycle.
